name: Infectionist
description:
Infectionist is a short mini-game like game in which you play as a zombie and have to infect as many humans as possible in 60 seconds!

Infected humans turn into humans which will attack other humans on sight.

Controls:

WASD - movement;

LMB - attack;

This game is still being developed! More coming soon!

This game was submitted to the One Minute Jam.
